titleStmt.title: By the King and Queen, a proclamation requiring the discovery and bringing in of arms lately imbezled
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
Mary II, Queen of England, 1662-1694.
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Hampton-Court the first day of April, 1689, in the first year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
